question: I did itikaaf during the last three days of Ramadan.....
answer:
QUESTION
I did itikaaf during the last three days of Ramadan (you know when you can't take to someone). On the third day, I got my period, so what I want to know is that "Was my itikaaf accepted or rejected from Allah?" I was truly sad when I got my period has this was my first time doing something like this for a very important purpose. Please advice?
ANSWER


Share:
A woman may sit in I'tikaaf even during the menses. Insha Allah, your I'
tikaaf will be accepted by Allah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.

CHECKED AND APPROVED: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
